pageContext.geocode_address: 180 Rhode Island Avenue, Newport, RI 02840, USA
pageContext.course_type_long_description: For experienced builders. Inspired by walkers, crawlers, speeders, racers, droids, bots, and ships from a long time ago in a galaxy far, far away. Bring fantasy machines to life in this unique camp, featuring a mixture of motorized creations and creative models. All projects are original designs by Play-Well instructors.
